General.Name: Strong H Machinery Technology (Cayman) Incorporation
General.Description: Strong H Machinery Technology (Cayman) Incorporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells sewing machine spare parts in China and Taiwan. It provides edges, needle plates, feed dogs, presser foots, needle clamps, and knives for embroidery sewing machines, as well as straight knife round knifes, gauge sets, and needle plate assemblies. The company offers its products under the STRONG H brand. Strong H Machinery Technology (Cayman) Incorporation was founded in 1994 and is based in Laizhou, China.
